widget.name: University Of Mumbai Info App
widget.description:
* This is an Application to preview and download syllabus for courses offered by Mumbai University as per Semester Patter from year 2012
** To Preview a syllabus file in google docs preview click/touch on the button with file name
*** To directly download the file to sdcard click/touch on the down arrow present on the right of every button
widget.author: jigar1859
